messages.messageBody:
Doh! scratch that - looks like I missed one - sorry! But they are all there in Japanese!!
I'll have to fix that tonight :(

Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Takeda Shingen's 24 Generals DESKTOP
WALLPAPER


Hey
Question again: Is it just me or are there only twenty-three generals
listed on the 24 generals shirt or is Takeda Shingen himself considered one of
the famous XXIV? (In other words, is it twenty four including or in addition
to Shingen?) Thanx. :-D

Tim
